[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "

Letter of Recommendation

For Student
Monze,Private Bag 1|+260970732464|monkey@gmail.com

"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

The Director
The Higher Education Loans and Scholarship Board
P. O Box 50464,
LUSAKA



DEAR SIR/MADAM
RE: RECOMMENDATION LETTER FOR {{ doc.student_name }} ;
EXAMINATIION NUMBER {{ doc.examination_number }}

Reference is made to the above stated subject
{{ doc.student_name }} was a bonafide pupil of St Edmunds Secondary School from {{ doc.date_of_entry }} to {{ doc.date_of_exit }} when he wrote his/her grade 12 examinations. While at school he was a hardworking boy/girl both in academic and non-academic activities and exhibited high level of responsibility when given a task. This enabled him obtain a division one school certificate. His only challenge was that s/he never had stable sponsorship for his school requirements. Therefore, I recommend him to your good office for sponsorship that can be extended to him/her so that him/her pursue his academic dreams.

Your considerations will be highly appreciated

Yours faithfully,

{{ doc.teacher }}
HEAD TEACHER

"}]
name: Recommendation Letter
